title: There Is A Green Hill Far Away

author.name: Cecil F. Alexander
author.bio: Cecil Frances Alexander was an Anglo-Irish hymn writer and poet. She is known for her hymns for children and is considered one of the finest of English hymn writers.

lyrics:
There is a green hill far away,
Without a city wall,
Where the dear Lord was crucified,
Who died to save us all.

We may not know, we cannot
tell,
What pains He had to bear,
But we believe it was for us,
He hung and suffered there.

He died that we might be
forgiven,
He died to make us good,
That we might go at last to
Heaven,
Saved by His precious blood.

There was no other good
enough,
To pay the price of sin,
He only could unlock the gate,
Of Heaven and let us in.

Oh, dearly, dearly has He loved,
And we must love Him too,
And trust in His redeeming blood,
And try His work to do.
